mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.main_id AS "mainId", a.name AS "name", a.duty AS "duty", a.out_type AS "outType", a.reason AS "reason", a.reason_content AS "reasonContent", a.related_attachment as "relatedAttachment", a.original_no AS "originalNo", a.vice_no AS "viceNo", a.files_no AS "filesNo", a.certificate_no AS "certificateNo", a.archives_no AS "archivesNo", a.approve_attachment AS "approveAttachment", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
